ruling: - You can't activate [[Dragged Down into the Grave]] if either you or your opponent has no cards in their hard other than [[Dragged Down into the Grave]]. But you can activate it if a player has no cards left in their Deck.
- The turn player selects a card first for [[Dragged Down into the Grave]].
- You can activate [[Appropriate]] in response to [[Dragged Down into the Grave]] because drawing was the last thing performed.
